title: Cortex Search Service commands | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
Snowflake provides SQL commands to create and manage
Cortex Search Service objects.
Creates a new Cortex Search Service or replaces an existing service.
Modifies the properties of an existing Cortex Search Service.
Lists the Cortex Search Service for which you have access privileges.
Describes the properties of a Cortex Search Service.
Removes the specified Cortex Search Service from the current/specified schema.
